name: inexhaustibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that keeps on happening and will never be completely used up: Like many Americans, she has an inexhaustibly positive outlook. He believes that the world is an inexhaustibly interesting place.
More examplesFewer examplesI am inexhaustibly outraged by the ignorance of the general public.A torrent of words poured inexhaustibly from his lips.I think that history is an inexhaustibly fascinating topic.I have watched this film many times over the years, but I still find it inexhaustibly entertaining.
